title: Bard

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give a player Bardic Inspiration. (4 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player has Bardic Inspiration, it will be consumed in the following scenarios:
• If you attack a player but the tier is equal to their defense, you will kill them.
• If you are attacked and it is 1 tier above your defense, you survive.
• If you are roleblocked, redirected or controlled, you gain immunity to that for the night.
